column5: Was up at the French launching out of Schell's camp the weekend of August 12-15.  Fishing was on fire.  Caught 10 walleye on the Saturday in a little over 2 hours..I have never done so well.  Most fish taken trolling a worm harness on the weed edges early morning.  Fish ranged from 13-22 inches, and i kept a few that were not in the slot.  Surprisingly, I only caught 1 pike and a few bass.  The walleye curse has been lifted for me....finally.
Great to hear ya had some success up ther.  I hope the big girls are hungrey in a few weeks.
The french river is awesome! I would imagine the water temps were in the high 70's, low 80's?
